summary: Babylon was an ancient city in Iraq, a cultural and political hub. It was the capital of two powerful empires: the Old Babylonian Empire (19th-16th centuries BC) and the Neo-Babylonian Empire (7th-6th centuries BC). The city was also part of other empires like the Achaemenid. Babylon was one of the ancient Near East's most significant cities, known for its impressive size and the Hanging Gardens, considered one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. Today, it is a UNESCO World Heritage Site, attracting many visitors.
title: Babylon
